input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: FEDERAL OFFICE FOR ROADS ASTRA - DEPARTMENT OF ROAD INFRASTRUCTURE-EAST - F3 ZOFINGEN. Summary: N02, Second Gotthard Tube (2Tg Röhre Nord) and N02 Rehabilitation of First Gotthard Tube (1Tg Röhre Süd) Bsa-Los 1302 - 20Kv Anlagen. Description: In order to enable the renovation of the existing - around 17 km long - Gotthard road tunnel, the Federal Council, Parliament and the population have decided to build a second tube. The BSA equipment of the second tube, referred to as tube north, will take place between 2027 and 2030, partly parallel to the completion of the structural work. Immediately after the opening of the North Tube for two-way traffic, the existing tube, known as the South Tube, will be replaced. The structural one Renovation is scheduled between 2030 and 2036. The existing BSA equipment on the south tube will be completely dismantled due to its age. This will be followed by structural renovation and new BSA equipment. In addition to the main work that... Foreseeing the realization of the second tube, the project also includes the redesign of the Airolo connection and the construction of the GdA gallery, which covers a 1 km long section of the motorway (km 108,140 - 107,050). The GdA will have two in the final state Lanes operated in each direction per tube. Main CPV: 31170000 transformers. Published Date: 2025-12-24. Closing Date: 2026-02-11. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

Description: EPFL plans to acquire silicon test wafers as well as polished double-sided silicon wafers for its Clean Room MicroNanotechnology (CMi) Center. A significant part of the process development at CMi is based on silicon substrates, which requires a substantial supply of silicon substrates. input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: EPFL-SCIENTIFIC EQUIPMENT. Summary: Wideband Frequency Multipliers for Continuous Measurement of Rf Semiconductor Devices Suitable for Vna Measurement Units. Description: EPFL wishes to acquire frequency multipliers suitable for VNA and VMU measurement units for the characterization of RF semiconductor devices, continuously covering a frequency range from a few MHz up to around 250-300 GHz for characterization in small signals, intended for its POWERlab at the Institute of Microtechnology and Electrical Engineering (IEM). The equipment will be dedicated to cutting-edge research on millimeter and sub-THz devices as well as integrated circuits monolithic microwaves (MMIC). In line with the scientific goals of the POWERlab, the focus will be on high-frequency, high-power devices for next-generation communications applications. Frequency multipliers will be used to characterize RF devices in the MHz-250-300 GHz range, connected to a Keysight PNA network analyzer. input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: TED - DISPOSAL + RECYCLING ZURICH (ERZ) HAGENHOLZSTRASSE 110, ZURICH. Summary: Delivery of Disc Brooms for Vacuum Sweepers. Description: The advertised service includes the exclusive delivery of disc brooms for vacuum sweepers from ERZ Disposal + Recycling Zurich city cleaning. The quantity structure of this tender is intended to cover the forecast demand for disc brooms and the required adapter plates (suitable for the vehicle) for 5 years. The annual quantities are calculated based on empirical values; the effective requirement or the effective quantity and types depend on the wear. There is no entitlement to a specific one Order quantity. Small station wagon - municipal equipment carrier (compatible with vehicle Hako Citymaster 600 / 650) Annual requirement of 900 disc brooms and 25 adapter plates. Medium combination - municipal equipment carrier (Hako Citymaster 1600 / 1650, Aebi Schmidt Flexigo 150) Annual requirement of 1400 disc brooms and 60 adapter plates. Small vacuum sweeper (Bucher City Cat 2020, Bucher City Cat V20e) Annual requirement of 1800 disc brooms and 50 adapter plates. Medium vacuum sweeper (Bucher City Cat 5006 and Bucher City Cat VR50e) Annual requirement of 1000 disc brooms and 30 adapter plates. Doc Title: Delivery of disc brooms for vacuum sweepers Contract Type: supplies. Published Date: 2025-12-23. Closing Date: 2026-02-06. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: EMPA ZENTRALER EINKAUF. Summary: Pyrolysis Equipment. Description: The pyrolysis of biogenic materials is a vast field of research. In addition to biochar, pyrolysis of biogenic materials also produces oils and gases. The pyrolysis products open up new possibilities for CO2-neutral and CO2-negative materials as well as CO2-neutral energy sources. In order to research the possibilities of pyrolysis of biogenic materials, we need to be able to produce large enough quantities at different pyrolysis parameters. Unfortunately, the pyrolysis methods and production quantities are severely limited by the existing equipment. The new plant is intended to expand the possibilities in terms of production quantities and production methods as well pyrolysis parameters for biochar. A key point here is that the pyrolysis plant should be able to handle the widest possible range of source materials. <br> Doc Title: Pyrolysis Equipment <br> Contract Type: supplies. Published Date: 2025-12-22. Closing Date: 2026-02-09. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: REAL - RECYCLING DISPOSAL WASTEWATER LUCERNE. Summary: P-157 Replacement Washer Sva. Description: REAL operates a sludge incineration plant (SVA), whose flue gas cleaning consists, among other things, of a wet scrubber with an acid and a basic scrubber column. Both columns show significant signs of age and are completely closed substitute. The subject of this submission project is the replacement of the acidic and basic scrubber columns. The entrepreneurial service includes detailed engineering, participation in meetings, design, manufacturing, delivery, assembly, Commissioning and complete documentation of the two new scrubber columns. The acid scrubber must be manufactured and delivered no later than three weeks before the planned assembly date in November 2026. The detailed engineering of the The acid and basic scrubber columns must be carried out in parallel and must be completed by the start of production of the acid scrubber at the latest. The alkaline scrubber must be manufactured and delivered no later than three weeks before the scheduled date Assembly date to take place in November 2027. The detailed engineering of the The acid and basic scrubber columns must be carried out in parallel and must be completed by the start of production of the acid scrubber at the latest. The alkaline scrubber must be manufactured and delivered no later than three weeks before the scheduled date Assembly date to take place in November 2027. P-157 replacement scrubber SVA REAL operates a sludge incineration plant (SVA), whose flue gas cleaning consists, among other things, of a wet scrubber with an acid and a basic scrubber column. Both columns show significant signs of age and must be completely replaced. The subject of this submission project is the replacement of the acidic and basic scrubber columns. The entrepreneurial service includes the detailed engineering...

input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: EPFL-SCIENTIFIC EQUIPMENT. Summary: Broadband Frequency Multiplier for Continuous Measurement of Rf Semiconductor Components, Suitable for Vna Measuring Devices. Description: EPFL wishes to acquire frequency multipliers suitable for VNA and VMU measurement units for the characterization of RF semiconductor devices, continuously covering a frequency range from a few MHz up to around 250-300 GHz for characterization in small signals, intended for its POWERlab at the Institute of Microtechnology and Electrical Engineering (IEM). The equipment will be dedicated to cutting-edge research on millimeter and sub-THz devices as well as integrated circuits monolithic microwaves (MMIC). In line with the scientific goals of the POWERlab, the focus will be on high-frequency, high-power devices for next-generation communications applications. Main CPV: 38000000 Equipment laboratory, optics and precision (except glasses). Published Date: 2025-12-22. Closing Date: 2026-02-02. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

The equipment will be dedicated to cutting-edge research on millimeter and sub-THz devices as well as integrated circuits monolithic microwaves (MMIC). input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: EMPA CENTRAL PURCHASING. Summary: Pyrolysis Equipment. Description: The pyrolysis of biogenic materials is a vast field of research. In addition to biochar, pyrolysis of biogenic materials also produces oils and gases. The pyrolysis products open up new possibilities for CO2-neutral and CO2-negative materials as well as CO2-neutral energy sources. In order to research the possibilities of pyrolysis of biogenic materials, we need to be able to produce large enough quantities at different pyrolysis parameters. Unfortunately, the pyrolysis methods and production quantities are severely limited by the existing equipment. Main CPV: 39711360 Ovens. Published Date: 2025-12-19. Closing Date: 2026-02-09. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Summary: Pyrolysis Equipment
output.Description: The pyrolysis of biogenic materials is a vast field of research. In addition to biochar, pyrolysis of biogenic materials also produces oils and gases. In order to research the possibilities of pyrolysis of biogenic materials, we need to be able to produce large enough quantities at different pyrolysis parameters. input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: FEDERAL OFFICE FOR ROADS ASTRA - DEPARTMENT OF ROAD INFRASTRUCTURE-EAST - F3 ZOFINGEN. Summary: N02, Second Gotthard Tube (2Tg Röhre Nord and Airolo Tunnel) and N02 Rehabilitation of the First Gotthard Tube (1Tg Röhre Süd), Bsa-Los 2004 - Optische Leiteinrichtung. Description: In order to enable the renovation of the existing - around 17 km long - Gotthard road tunnel, the Federal Council, Parliament and the population have decided to build a second tube. The BSA equipment of the second tube, referred to as tube north, will take place between 2027 and 2030, partly parallel to the completion of the structural work. Parallel to the north tube, the Galleria di Airolo (GdA) with a length of around 1 km is also being built, which is an integral part of the Gotthard system forms. The GdA will be equipped with modern lighting systems, security systems and centralized control, in accordance with ASTRA specifications. Main CPV: 34993100 Tunnel lighting. Published Date: 2025-12-18. Closing Date: 2026-02-18. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: FEDERAL OFFICE FOR ROADS ASTRA - DEPARTMENT OF ROAD INFRASTRUCTURE-EAST - F3 ZOFINGEN. Summary: N02, Secondo Tubo San Gottardo (2Tg Tube North and Galleria Di Airolo) and N02 Risanamento Primo Tubo San Gottardo (1Tg Tube South), Bsa Lot 2003 - Cabling Lighting. Description: In order to enable the renovation of the existing - around 17 km long - Gotthard road tunnel, the Federal Council, Parliament and the population have decided to build a second tube. The BSA equipment of the second tube, referred to as tube north, will take place between 2027 and 2030, partly parallel to the completion of the structural work. Parallel to the north tube, the Galleria di Airolo (GdA) with a length of around 1 km is also being built, which is an integral part of the Gotthard system forms. The GdA will be equipped with modern lighting systems, security systems and centralized control, in accordance with ASTRA specifications. Main CPV: 34993100 Tunnel lighting. Published Date: 2025-12-17. Closing Date: 2026-02-17. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

The ban on the sale of compact fluorescent lamps and ring lights has been in effect since February 2023, including fluorescent tubes Sales ban came into effect in August 2023. The FL lights need to be replaced with new LED lights. These conversions and new installations take place during ongoing operations. Main CPV: 31500000 Electric lamps and lights. input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: FEDERAL OFFICE FOR ROADS ASTRA - DEPARTMENT OF ROAD INFRASTRUCTURE-EAST - F3 ZOFINGEN. Summary: N02, Second Gotthard Tube (2Tg Röhre Nord and Airolo Tunnel) and N02 Rehabilitation of First Gotthard Tube (1Tg Röhre Süd), Bsa-Los 8303 Hausinstallationen. Description: In order to enable the renovation of the existing - around 17 km long - Gotthard road tunnel, the Federal Council, Parliament and the population have decided to build a second tube. The BSA equipment of the second tube, referred to as tube north, will take place between 2027 and 2030, partly parallel to the completion of the structural work. Parallel to the north tube, the Galleria di Airolo (GdA) with a length of around 1 km is also being built, which is an integral part of the Gotthard system forms. Main CPV: 31213300 cable distribution cabinet. Published Date: 2025-12-16. Closing Date: 2026-02-20. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: BKW ENERGIE AG - PROCUREMENT SERVICES. Summary: New it Solution for Customer-Centric Billing and Service Processes Energy & Networks. Description: This public tender will procure an integrated software solution for the energy industry. This should include contract management as well as measurement-based billing of energy and network services as well as digitalization and automation of customer processes (customer relationship management). Lot 1 includes the areas of commercial contract management, customer service, network connection management, marketing as well as the comprehensive control and orchestration of customer and partner-related processes. Contract management and billing for measurement-based tariffs Lot 2 covers the areas of operational contract management as well as the billing of measured value-based energy and network services for consumers and producer. Doc Title: New IT solution for customer-centric billing and service processes Energy & Networks Contract Type: services. Published Date: 2025-12-16. Closing Date: 2026-02-06. Competition: ICB. input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: ETH ZÜRICH - ABT. PROCUREMENT & EXPORT SERVICES. Summary: Two-Photon 3D Lithography Printing System First-Cla at Eth Zurich. Description: The FIRST-CLA platform of ETH Zurich invites bids for the purchase of a two-photon three-dimensional (3D) micro- and nanolithography system. The instrument will be used for: 1) 3D printing of submicron and micron sized features with nanometer-resolution and nanometer surface roughness 2) 3D printing of structures in the order of submilimeter to several millimetres in XYZ with shell/scaffolding and freely moving parts. System must allow the user to switch between different configurations (high-est resolution, lower resolution but faster). 3) 3D printing on different substrates such as wafers, chips, and fibers of opaque and transparent nature without pretreatment. For further information please refer to the tender documents. <br> Doc Title: Two-photon 3D lithography printing system FIRST-CLA at ETH Zurich <br> Contract Type: supplies. Published Date: 2025-12-15. Closing Date: 2026-02-05. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: VAUD-GENEVE BIOMEDICAL ENGINEERING AND ENGINEERING.. Summary: Data Protection Solution for Chuv. Description: The Vaudois University Hospital Center (CHUV) is launching this call for tenders for the acquisition and implementation of a data protection solution. Faced with the constant intensification of cyber threats, the CHUV has decided to strengthen protection of its data, in particular against the risks of exfiltration and leakage of sensitive information. The objective is twofold: · Classify unstructured data (documents, emails, images) using a labeling mechanism (file labeling), · Prevent data leaks (Data Loss Prevention) from terminals or the CHUV network. This contract concerns the acquisition of a solution under a three-year firm contract, renewable twice per one-year period by decision of the CHUV, i.e. a maximum contractual duration of five years. Description: With this tender, the contracting authority intends to procure a replacement for the existing KVM matrix system in the network control center at the headquarters of CKW AG. The CKW network control center works in shifts and carries out a wide variety of tasks for both organizational units within your own business area as well as for other areas of the company. To fulfill these tasks, more than 30 different applications and control systems as well as office applications are used. These applications are operated either via dedicated servers and clients in the Operational Technology (OT) or in Information Technology (IT).<br> The work contract includes the planning, delivery and commissioning of a new KVM matrix system at the main location at a redundant replacement location. input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: PAUL SCHERRER INSTITUT (PSI). Summary: Laser for Pump-Probe Spectroscopy at Sls 2.0. Description: This is a call for tender for a laser system which will be utilized at the Swiss Light Source 2.0 (SLS 2.0) synchrotron for pump-probe experiments at two distinct beamlines, SuperXAS and Phoenix. These experiments, conducted within the same building, require the laser to be mobile between the two beamlines. For pump-probe spectroscopy, the laser is to provide tunable wavelengths spanning the ultraviolet (UV) to near-infrared (near-IR) range. The laser pulse duration needs to be shorter than the X-ray pulses, thus requiring pulses in the tens of picoseconds (ps) or shorter timescale regime. Efficient excitation of the studied materials necessitates a high repetition rate in the range 40-131 kHz combined with a high pulse energy. <br> Doc Title: Laser for pump-probe spectroscopy at SLS 2.0 <br> Contract Type: supplies. Published Date: 2025-12-05. Closing Date: 2026-01-23. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Summary: Laser for Pump-Probe Spectroscopy at Sls 2.0

input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: FEDERAL OFFICE FOR ROADS ASTRA - DEPARTMENT OF ROAD INFRASTRUCTURE-EAST - F3 ZOFINGEN. Summary: N02, Second Gotthard Tube (2Tg Roehre Nord) and N02 Rehabilitation of First Gotthard Tube (1Tg Roehre Sued) Bsa-Los 1302 20Kv Anlagen. Description: In order to enable the renovation of the existing - around 17 km long - Gotthard road tunnel, the Federal Council, Parliament and the population have decided to build a second tube. The BSA equipment of the second tube, referred to as the North tube, will take place in part between 2027 and 2030 parallel to the completion of the structural work. Immediately after the opening of the North Tube for two-way traffic, the existing tube, known as the South Tube, will be replaced. The structural renovation is scheduled between 2030 and 2036. The existing BSA equipment of the Due to its age, the south tube will be completely dismantled. This will be followed by structural renovation and new BSA equipment. In addition to the main work that involves the realization of the second tube, the project also includes the redesign of the Airolo connection and the construction of the GdA gallery, which covers a 1km section of the highway (km 108,140 107,050). In its final state, the GdA will be operated with two lanes in each direction per tube.<br> Main CPV: 31170000 The transformer. Published Date: 2025-12-04. Closing Date: 2026-02-11. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Purchaser_Name: FEDERAL OFFICE FOR ROADS ASTRA - DEPARTMENT OF ROAD INFRASTRUCTURE-EAST - F3 ZOFINGEN
output.Summary: N02, Second Gotthard Tube (2Tg Roehre Nord) and N02 Rehabilitation of First Gotthard Tube (1Tg Roehre Sued) Bsa-Los 1302 20Kv Anlagen
output.Description: In order to enable the renovation of the existing - around 17 km long - Gotthard road tunnel, the Federal Council, Parliament and the population have decided to build a second tube. The BSA equipment of the second tube, referred to as the North tube, will take place in part between 2027 and 2030 parallel to the completion of the structural work. Immediately after the opening of the North Tube for two-way traffic, the existing tube, known as the South Tube, will be replaced. The structural renovation is scheduled between 2030 and 2036. The existing BSA equipment of the Due to its age, the south tube will be completely dismantled. This will be followed by structural renovation and new BSA equipment. In addition to the main work that involves the realization of the second tube, the project also includes the redesign of the Airolo connection and the construction of the GdA gallery, which covers a 1km section of the highway (km 108,140 107,050). In its final state, the GdA will be operated with two lanes in each direction per tube.<br> Main CPV: 31170000 The transformer

input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: CITY OF ZURICH TRAFFIC DEPARTMENT. Summary: Renewal of Parking Apps (Epa). Description: The city of Zurich is re-tendering the service for the provision, introduction, further development, maintenance and support of a mobile app for solving parking problems, as the current contracts expire in March 2027. We are looking for providers whose solution offers central functions like this Starting/stopping parking processes, billing according to tariff zones, payment and reporting to the city's parking data platform (PDP). The app must communicate with the parking data platform and always be able to process current tariff data via a defined interface.<br> renewal Parking apps (EPA)<br> Doc Title: Renewal of parking apps (EPA)<br> Contract Type: services. input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: FOUNDATION OF THE LAUSANNE OPERA. Summary: Outsourcing Service for the Lausanne Opera. Description: Currently, the management of its IT and telephone infrastructure is entrusted by the Opera to the Organization and IT Service (SOI) of the City of Lausanne (VdL), on the basis of a service contract. With the exception of systems linked to stage technique, all of the infrastructure is managed by the SOI. The Opera is included in the shared SOI infrastructure and is considered another City service.<br> The needs and risk management desired by the Lausanne Opera cannot be provided in full by the SOI. In this context, the Management wishes to use the services of a private company.<br> This IT service provider will be responsible for implementing a new modern and secure infrastructure solution and migrating the Opera's users and data.<br> At the end of the transition phase, it will ensure the management, administration, maintenance and security of services. The Opera does not want to have internal IT management skills and wishes to rely on a single partner.<br> Outsourcing service for the Lausanne Opera<br> Currently, the management of its IT and telephone infrastructure is entrusted by the Opera to the Organization and IT Service (SOI) of the City of Lausanne (VdL), on the basis of a service contract. input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: BERN CANTONAL POLICE. Summary: Video Interview Rooms. Description: As a result of changes in the law, video interviews can be used more widely in the canton of Bern in the future. In order to meet the sharp increase in demand within Kapo BE, new, hybrid video interrogation rooms are to be created at various locations in the canton of Bern. Therefore the Renewal of the video interrogation system was put out to tender.<br> The framework contract to be concluded includes in particular delivery, installation, project planning, conception, training and maintenance and support in the area of ​​video interrogation systems in existing and new rooms as well as in meeting rooms.<br> Further details can be found in the tender documents.<br> Doc Title: Video Interrogation Rooms<br> Contract type: services. Unfortunately, the property is not suitable for this due to the number of trees and the terrain Geothermal probes are used, which is why a solution with outside air as a heat source is sought. input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: ENERGY WATER BERN. Summary: Ebp-555_Procurement of Vehicles. Description: This tender will be used to procure commercial vehicles and passenger vehicles (cars) in various categories. The procurement item also includes services such as registration of the vehicles, short training upon handover, and maintenance for at least 5 years (service package), replacement vehicles as needed and a warranty period of at least 5 years. The vehicles to be procured will be used primarily in urban areas (stop and go) and for commuting to work during on-call operations. The vehicles are purchased by ewb (not leased) and are intended to be one Have a useful life of at least five (5) years. The charging infrastructure for electric vehicles is excluded from this tender. The lots listed in section 6.6 of the specifications will be advertised. There will be at least one contractual partner (= 1 contractual partner for all 3 lots), or We are looking for up to a maximum of three (3) contractual partners (i.e. one contractual partner per lot with all vehicle categories required). This means that up to three lots can be offered.<br> Main CPV: 34000000 means of transport and products for transport purposes. Published Date: 2025-11-28. Closing Date: 2026-01-05. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

Description: The client's SOC has the basic task of monitoring the organization's IT landscape around the clock and taking appropriate measures in the event of security incidents.<br> The previous contractual partner focused on endpoint detection and response (EDR), analysis and incidents Response, vulnerability management and security information and event management (SIEM), so this tender essentially includes the replacement of the said components and services. While some tasks are now carried out by the client's SOC, these are internal human resources are a limiting factor. Therefore, some tasks, including ongoing monitoring of the environment, will still need to be carried out jointly with the support of an external partner.<br> The future environment should be based on the current, internal log data platform based on Splunk, which is expanded into a SIEM. This platform is to be supplemented by a Managed Detection and Response (MDR) solution, which works using its own data lake and transmits alerts to the internal SIEM. Continuous monitoring should take place based on the MDR service In the future, the client's employees will primarily deal with the internal SIEM and can therefore also cover internal and organization-specific use cases.<br> The systems are supplemented with various services to operate the SIEM platform, but also with Cyber-Analysed.... Published Date: 2025-11-20. Closing Date: 2026-01-23. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

Summary: N02, Second Gotthard Tube (2tg Röhre Nord and Airolo Tunnel) and N02 Rehabilitation of First Gotthard Tube (1tg Röhre Süd), Bsa-los 8303 Hausinstallationen. Description: In order to enable the renovation of the existing - around 17 km long - Gotthard road tunnel, the Federal Council, Parliament and the population have decided to build a second tube. The BSA equipment for the second tube, known as the North Tube, will take place between 2027 and 2030, partly parallel to the completion of the structural work. Parallel to the north tube, the Galleria di Airolo (GdA) with a length of around 1 km is also being built, which forms an integral part of the Gotthard system.<br> Main CPV: 31213300 cable distribution cabinet. input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: ETH ZURICH - REAL ESTATE DEPARTMENT. Summary: Eth Zurich, Hpl, Bkp 233 Lighting Delivery, Epic, Led Conversion. Description: In the EPIC areas (floors A and C) in the HPL building, as in the entire HPL, luminaires with T5 fluorescent tubes were installed. In the project perimeter and the other animal husbandries at ETH, research is being conducted into animal behavior, among other things. The light or Lighting is a determining factor in animal physiology (metabolism). That-s why high-quality light is crucial. If the lighting conditions vary, a longer acclimatization period must be expected when changing animal husbandry before use in animal experiments. Therefore, the lighting should be coordinated with the areas that have already been implemented (HCI, Prof. Razansky and in the animal husbandry in Basel).<br> Main CPV: 31520000 lights and lighting accessories. It concerns more precisely the renovation of the LS-S level (PLC and local HMI parts) of the four BSA sections of the Geneva bypass :<br> • Plan-les-Ouates (SPLO);<br> • Confignon (SCFG);<br> • Vernier (SVRN);<br> • Airport (SAER).<br> The technical interfaces of lot 183 are to be established with the installations currently in operation initially and then with the new signaling which will be deployed in a second phase.<br> The summary of the work of lot 183 necessary for the implementation of the new LS-S are:<br> • drafting RPH and DAW files;<br> • the reverse engineering of the control and command of the existing signaling installations of the four BSA sections concerned: SPLO, SCFG, SVRN and SAER;<br> • supply and installation LS-S of the four BSA sections concerned;<br> • the supply of LS-S power supply cabinets;<br> • the electrical connections of the cabinets;<br> • the developments of the LS-S for the four BSA sections concerned;<br> • control command of existing signaling with the new LS-S;<br> • there software qualification (monitoring requirements, carrying out platform and site tests);<br> • deployment and on-site production of LS-S in several stages;<br> • carrying out work in technical premises (around 10 technical buildings);<br> • control migration order.... Description: The city of Duebendorf is building a new indoor swimming pool on the existing outdoor swimming pool area at Oberdorfstrasse 23, 8600 Duebendorf. The building planned as a replacement building will be located in the area of ​​the existing outdoor swimming pool infrastructure. Summary: N02, Second Gotthard Tube (2Tg Roehre Nord) and N02 Rehabilitation of First Gotthard Tube (1Tg Roehre Sued) Bsa-Los 8002 Normalisierte Schranke. Description: In order to enable the renovation of the existing - around 17 km long - Gotthard road tunnel, the Federal Council, Parliament and the population have decided to build a second tube. The BSA equipment of the second tube, referred to as the North tube, will take place in part between 2027 and 2030 parallel to the completion of the structural work. Parallel to the north tube, the Galleria di Airolo (GdA) with a length of around 1 km will also be built, which forms an integral part of the Gotthard system.<br> Main CPV: 31213300 Kabelverteilschrank. input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: SBB CFF FFS INFRA-ENERGIE. Summary: Machine Groups Ewag. Description: The Etzelwerk power plant, built between 1932 and 1937, uses the gradient between Lake Sihl and Lake Zurich to generate energy and produces around 10% of Switzerland's traction power requirements. After the license renewal in 2023, SBB is now renewing and replacing parts of the system of the Etzelwerk pumped storage power plant as part of the Etzelwerk power plant renewal project. The subject of this tender is the renewal of the original machine sets 1-3 as well as subsystems of machine groups 4-6. Further services are available as part of options Future renewal work on machine groups 4-7 has been tendered, which is currently planned following the work on machine groups 1-3. Further information about the project can be found in the project description (Document B1).<br> The following lots are part of this tender:<br> - Go 401 Machine groups 1 to 3, comprising the main components motor/generator and turbines of machine groups 1-3 and turbine ball valves of machine groups 1-6 (hereinafter referred to as lot 401)<br> - Lot 402 storage pump MG3, comprising the storage pump of machine group 3 and the pump ball valves Machine groups 3 and 4 (hereinafter referred to as lot 402)<br> The services advertised in this tender include the planning, manufacture, delivery, assembly, commissioning and acceptance testing of the main components and their auxiliary systems and the others advertised K.... input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: ENERGY WATER BERN. Summary: Ebp-555_Procurement of Vehicles. Description: This tender will be used to procure commercial vehicles and passenger vehicles (cars) in various categories. The procurement item also includes services such as vehicle registration, short training upon handover, etc Maintenance for at least 5 years (service package), replacement vehicles as needed and a warranty period of at least 5 years. The vehicles to be procured will be primarily for urban use (stop and go) and for commuting to work during on-call operations used. The vehicles are purchased from ewb (not leased) and should have a useful life of at least five (5) years. The charging infrastructure for electric vehicles is excluded from this tender. They are advertised in the section 6.6 of the specifications. We are looking for a minimum of one contractual partner (= 1 contractual partner for all 3 lots), or a maximum of three (3) contractual partners (i.e. one contractual partner per lot with all vehicle categories required therein). This means that up to three lots can be offered. Main CPV: 34000000 means of transport and products for transport purposes. Published Date: 2025-11-07. Closing Date: 2025-12-17. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: SBB CFF FFS INFRA-ENERGIE. Summary: Machine Groups Ewag. Description: The Etzelwerk power plant, built between 1932 and 1937, uses the gradient between Lake Sihl and Lake Zurich to generate energy and produces around 10% of Switzerland's traction power requirements. After the license renewal in 2023, the SBB now runs the Renewal and replacement of plant components of the Etzelwerk pumped storage power plant as part of the Etzelwerk power plant renewal project. The subject of this tender is the renewal of the original machine sets 1-3 as well Subsystems of machine groups 4-6. Further services will be tendered as part of options for future renovation work on machine groups 4-7, which are currently planned following the work on machine groups 1-3. More Information about the project can be found in the project description (Document B1). Main CPV: 42100000 machines for the production and use of mechanical energy. Published Date: 2025-11-07. Closing Date: 2026-03-13. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: SBB CFF FFS INFRA-ENERGIE. Summary: Machine Groups Ewag. Description: The Etzelwerk power plant, built between 1932 and 1937, uses the gradient between Lake Sihl and Lake Zurich to generate energy and produces around 10% of Switzerland's traction power requirements. After the license renewal in 2023, SBB is now renewing and replacing parts of the system of the Etzelwerk pumped storage power plant as part of the Etzelwerk power plant renewal project. The subject of this tender is the renewal of the original machine sets 1-3 as well as subsystems of machine groups 4-6. Further services are available as part of options Future renewal work on machine groups 4-7 has been tendered, which is currently planned following the work on machine groups 1-3. Further information about the project can be found in the project description (Document B1).<br> The following lots are part of this tender:<br> - Go 401 Machine groups 1 to 3, comprising the main components motor/generator and turbines of machine groups 1-3 and turbine ball valves of machine groups 1-6 (hereinafter referred to as lot 401)<br> - Lot 402 storage pump MG3, comprising the storage pump of machine group 3 and the pump ball valves Machine groups 3 and 4 (hereinafter referred to as lot 402)<br> The services advertised in this tender include the planning, manufacture, delivery, assembly, commissioning and acceptance testing of the main components and their auxiliary systems and the others advertised K.... Published Date: 2025-11-05. Closing Date: 2026-03-13. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

After the license renewal in 2023, the SBB now runs the Renewal and replacement of plant components of the Etzelwerk pumped storage power plant as part of the Etzelwerk power plant renewal project. The subject of this tender is the renewal of the original machine sets 1-3 as well Subsystems of machine groups 4-6. Further services will be tendered as part of options for future renovation work on machine groups 4-7, which are currently planned following the work on machine groups 1-3. Summary: Implementation of an Iot Infrastructure for Building Management (M348ti) Electrical Installations Mandate. Description: Electrical installation services<br> Estimate: CHF 579,000.-<br> The Energy Department of the City of Geneva (hereinafter abbreviated by ENE) acts to maintain and optimize technical installations and reduce the energy consumption of the built heritage of the City of Geneva. In the as part of a loan granted by the City of Geneva for the development of loT projects, ENE wants to set up an loT network based mainly on LoRa technology and covering the entire value chain, i.e. sensors, the LoRa network, data processing and visualization collected. ENE already manages some 400 installed sensors today and plans to deploy more than 1,500 as part of this project. A service provider is being sought to set up and manage this future LoT network as well as to promote and present the data collected.<br> The project covers the establishment of a LoT network using LoRa technology for the recording and processing of data generated by sensors deployed in buildings in the territory of the City of Geneva. The project includes the following elements:<br> * Provision of a LoRa service based on an existing network with geographical coverage covering the territory of the City of Geneva and neighboring municipalities;<br> * The supply and installation of sensors ensuring the recording and sending of data (temperatures, humidity, energy, water, gas, alarms, etc.);<br> * Implementation of interfaces Nec.... input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: WINTERTHUR CANTONAL HOSPITAL - SUPPLY CHAIN MANAGEMENT. Summary: Licensing Microsoft. Description: The aim of this tender is to ensure Microsoft licensing in accordance with the licensing strategy redefined in 2025. We are looking for a licensing partner who can reliably, economically and reliably provide the Winterthur Cantonal Hospital with the necessary licenses for the years 2026 to 2028 in the desired configuration. With this tender, the KSW is identifying a licensing partner for the years 2026-2028 (lot 1) and a license supplier for individual licenses for the year 2025 (lot 2)<br> Licensing 2026-2028<br> This lot includes the licenses from the KSW's existing contracts with Microsoft: • Select+ • Enterprise Agreement (EA) • Cloud Solution Provider (CSP) • Server and Cloud Enrollment (SCE)<br> Purchasing individual licenses<br> In order to address the increasing cost pressure in the healthcare system and to keep IT spending as low as possible in the coming years certain Microsoft Office licenses should be procured as verified used licenses. This lot includes the delivery of licenses that are fully compliant and operational from a legal and technical perspective.<br> Doc Title: Licensing Microsoft<br> Contract type: supplies. Published Date: 2025-10-30. Closing Date: 2025-11-24. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Purchaser_Name: WINTERTHUR CANTONAL HOSPITAL - SUPPLY CHAIN MANAGEMENT

With this tender, the KSW is identifying a licensing partner for the years 2026-2028 (lot 1) and a license supplier for individual licenses for the year 2025 (lot 2)<br> Licensing 2026-2028<br> This lot includes the licenses from the KSW's existing contracts with Microsoft: • Select+ • Enterprise Agreement (EA) • Cloud Solution Provider (CSP) • Server and Cloud Enrollment (SCE)<br> Purchasing individual licenses<br> In order to address the increasing cost pressure in the healthcare system and to keep IT spending as low as possible in the coming years certain Microsoft Office licenses should be procured as verified used licenses. input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: BERN CANTONAL POLICE. Summary: Broadcom Vmware and Omnissa Horizon Vdi Licenses. Description: Since 2010, the Bern Canton Police have consistently and exclusively used the VMware product as a server virtualization platform to optimize hardware usage. After initially using a few licenses, server virtualization has grown in the Bern Cantonal Police in recent years, so that the renewal will now be put out to tender over several years using an open procedure.<br> This tender is looking for a single provider who can provide licenses from Broadcom (VMware products) as well as VDI Horizon from Omnissa to the Bern Cantonal Police as a reseller can provide. The Bern Cantonal Police is looking for a reliable and competent provider with whom a framework agreement can be concluded for the purchase of Broadcom VMware products AND VDI Horizon from Omnissa.<br> Further details can be found in the tender documents.<br> Broadcom VMware and Omnissa Horizon VDI licenses<br> The Bern Canton Police have been using a server virtualization platform to optimize hardware usage since 2010 consistently and only the product VMware. input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: SBB CFF FFS INFRA-ENERGIE. Summary: Machine Groups Ewag. Description: The Etzelwerk power plant, built between 1932 and 1937, uses the gradient between Lake Sihl and Lake Zurich to generate energy and produces around 10% of Switzerland's traction power requirements. After the license renewal in 2023, SBB is now renewing and replacing parts of the system of the Etzelwerk pumped storage power plant as part of the Etzelwerk power plant renewal project. The subject of this tender is the renewal of the original machine sets 1-3 as well as subsystems of machine groups 4-6. Further services are available as part of options Future renewal work on machine groups 4-7 has been tendered, which is currently planned following the work on machine groups 1-3. Further information about the project can be found in the project description (Document B1).<br> The following lots are part of this tender:<br> - Go 401 Machine groups 1 to 3, comprising the main components motor/generator and turbines of machine groups 1-3 and turbine ball valves of machine groups 1-6 (hereinafter referred to as lot 401)<br> - Lot 402 storage pump MG3, comprising the storage pump of machine group 3 and the pump ball valves Machine groups 3 and 4 (hereinafter referred to as lot 402)<br> The services advertised in this tender include the planning, manufacture, delivery, assembly, commissioning and acceptance testing of the main components and their auxiliary systems and the others advertised K.... Description: The Etzelwerk power plant, built between 1932 and 1937, uses the gradient between Lake Sihl and Lake Zurich to generate energy and produces around 10% of Switzerland's traction power requirements. After the license renewal in 2023, the SBB now runs the Renewal and replacement of plant components of the Etzelwerk pumped storage power plant as part of the Etzelwerk power plant renewal project. The subject of this tender is the renewal of the original machine sets 1-3 as well Subsystems of machine groups 4-6. Further services will be tendered as part of options for future renovation work on machine groups 4-7, which are currently planned following the work on machine groups 1-3. More Information about the project can be found in the project description (Document B1). Main CPV: 42100000 machines for the production and use of mechanical energy. Published Date: 2025-10-22. input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: CITY OF WIL, TECHNICAL OPERATIONS, TBW. Summary: District Heating Wil, Tender for Transfer Stations, Control System and Leak Monitoring. Description: The Technical Operations Wil (TBW) is planning a district heating network. This is supplied with waste heat from the waste incineration plant of the Bazenheid Waste Recycling Association (ZAB). The heat is transported to the south of the city of Wil via a 5.2 km long transfer line. From there it is distributed over two main lines: one leads to the west of the city to the St.Gallen Psychiatry, the other to the east via the Lindenhof school complex to Wil Hospital. The first heat delivery in Wil is planned for the 2026/2027 heating season.<br> Main CPV: 48000000 software package and information systems. Published Date: 2025-10-11. Closing Date: 2025-11-25. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Purchaser_Name: CITY OF WIL, TECHNICAL OPERATIONS, TBW
output.Summary: District Heating Wil, Tender for Transfer Stations, Control System and Leak Monitoring

This is supplied with waste heat from the waste incineration plant of the Bazenheid Waste Recycling Association (ZAB). The heat is transported to the south of the city of Wil via a 5.2 km long transfer line. From there it is distributed over two main lines: one leads to the west of the city to the St.Gallen Psychiatry, the other to the east via the Lindenhof school complex to Wil Hospital. The first heat delivery in Wil is planned for the 2026/2027 heating season.<br> Main CPV: 48000000 software package and information systems

input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: PAUL SCHERRER INSTITUTE (PSI). Summary: Large Vacuum Chambers for the Himb Beamline. Description: As part of this project, vacuum chambers for the new HIMB beamline at the PSI proton facility are to be manufactured. The fabrication of vacuum chambers with dimensions exceeding 3 m in height, 1 m in width, and 2 m in length should include internal welding in order to ensure compatibility with vacuum performance requirements. After final machining of these large vacuum chambers, a specialized cleaning process must be applied to minimize the outgassing rate.<br> Main CPV: 31643000 Particle accelerators. Published Date: 2025-10-10. Closing Date: 2025-11-19. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

output.Summary: Large Vacuum Chambers for the Himb Beamline

After final machining of these large vacuum chambers, a specialized cleaning process must be applied to minimize the outgassing rate.<br> Main CPV: 31643000 Particle accelerators

Description: In order to enable the renovation of the existing - around 17 km long - Gotthard Strassentunnel, the Federal Council, Parliament and the population decided to build a second tube. The BSA equipment of the second tube, referred to as tube north, takes place from 2027 to 2030, partly in parallel to the completion of the structural work. Immediately after the opening of the tube north in oncoming, the existing tube, which is referred to as tube south. The structural renovation is scheduled for 2030 to 2036. The existing BSA equipment of the tube south is completely dismantled due to its age. This is followed by the structural renovation and the BSA new equipment. In the final state, the GTG is operated at a speed of 80 km/h in the direction of direction (a lane plus breakdown strip per tube). input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: SBB CFF FFS INFRA-ENERGIE. Summary: Uw Pian Scairolo Cable and Assembly Work. Description: A GU is sought for scairolo for UL work, which takes care of both the material and the assembly on site.<br> The following work packages are included:<br> • Withdrawal of the outdated 66 kV cable of the two ULS from Vezia in the existing cable duct from the sleeve in the muffle shaft Gemmo to the Existing crash portal Pian Scairolo.<br> • Cable laying for the two ULs from Vezia with new 132 KV cables from the Gemmo muffle shaft to the GIS IM New UW Pian Scairolo (including introduction to the GIS & Muffe in Gemmo). The GU-UL is also for the cable application systems, the fastening material, die Briden, the cable directions, fire defects & grounds.<br> • Cable laying with new 132 KV cables for the UL from Mendrisio from the existing piano scairolo to the GIS in the new UW Pian Scairolo (including introduction to the GIS, new cable end locks, new KEV scaffolding, new ones Supplementary discount, insulators & their grounds on the existing crash portal and connection to the existing UL-SIES). The GU-UL is also responsible for the cable application systems, the fastening material, the bridges, the cable seals, fire shooters and all grounds.<br> • Cable laying With new 15 KV cables for the two ULS 42 & 44 after Melide from the IRS system in the new UW Pian Scairolo to the existing crash portal (including introduction to the IRS, new cable ends, new KEV scaffolding, new overvoltage discounts, isolators & their grounds on the existing A.... Published Date: 2025-09-08. Closing Date: 2025-11-06. Competition: ICB. Financier Name: Self Financed

input: Country: Switzerland. Purchaser Name: SWISSGRID AG. Summary: Software-Asset-Management (Sam). Description: The tender refers to the provision of comprehensive services in the area of ​​software asset management (SAM), which support an effective management of software assets at Swissgrid.<br> In view of the challenges through the transition to cloud -based services and the need to To keep an exact overview of all acquired, rented and used software assets is Swissgrid in search of a SAM service provider who ensures optimal license, compliance security and cost efficiency.<br> The focus is on implementation, the company And the continuous optimization of the SAM processes, supported by a SAM tool that meets the specific requirements of Swissgrid. The service includes high -quality data maintenance, integration with existing systems such as the CMDB and the SCCM, as well as the Adaptability to future developments and high user -friendliness.
